def onEdit(self, evt, key):
        base.le.ui.bindKeyEvents(False)
        editUI = EditHotKeyDialog(self, -1, 'Edit Hot Key', key)
        editUI.ShowModal()
        editUI.Destroy()

        sizer = self.GetSizer()
        if sizer is not None:
            sizer.DeleteWindows()
            self.SetSizer(None)
        base.le.ui.bindKeyEvents(True)
        self.updateUI()
